name: Mustang Survival Bluewater 20L Waterproof Roll Top Dry Bag
categories: Bluewater 20L Waterproof Roll Top Dry Bag
description: Reliable waterproofness when on the water or the trail. The cube shape stacks well with other bags and won't roll around in the bottom of your boat.210-denier ripstop nylon with a super-durable TPU coating.Welded construction, reinforced with taped seams.Cube shape packs efficiently with other rectangular bags.Note: these dry bags do not provide submersible waterproof protection or impact protection. For electronics, we recommend hard cases with gasket seals.
